lead_paragraph: SCAGLIONE--Carolyn R. Denning MD. A true visionary in the care of people with cystic fibrosis. We are so grateful for her unwavering support, and our team is proud to carry her legacy forward. Our heartfelt condolences to Dr. Peter Scaglione and family, including our colleague Ben. Maria Berdella, M.D. Patricia Walker, M.D. The Cystic Fibrosis Center, Mount Sinai Beth Israel 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SCAGLIONE, CAROLYN R
